name: @tagspaces/tagspaces-ws
description: Web Service for creating thumbnails and index used by the TagSpaces application
author: TagSpaces Authors <contact@tagspaces.org>

scripts.build:dev: npm run install-node && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development
scripts.build: npm run install-node && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.install-node-old: npx @tagspaces/dynamic-packages-loading ./ -p node && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node npm run-script --prefix ./node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-platforms install && npm --prefix ./node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-platforms dedupe
scripts.install-node-linux: npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node TARGET_PLATFORM=linux TARGET_ARCH=x64 node install/ws.js
scripts.install-node-mac: npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node TARGET_PLATFORM=darwin TARGET_ARCH=x64 node install/ws.js
scripts.install-node-win: npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node TARGET_PLATFORM=win32 TARGET_ARCH=x64 node install/ws.js
scripts.install-web: npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf package-lock.json && npx @tagspaces/dynamic-packages-loading ./ -p web
scripts.test-thumbgen: curl -v -d '["file_path.jpg"]' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer xxx" -X POST http://127.0.0.1:2000/thumb-gen
scripts.pkg-publish: npm run install-node && npm run build && npm publish --access public
